phrases: You are the one who gives me my future
Even on a road without signs, I will be fine, if we are together
On a journey that I cannot see ahead of, while I was lost, I found it
That my place to be is next to you
When we quarrelled, I let go of your hand again and again
I want to pull close and hold it now
You are the one who gives me my future
If I am beaten down by the rain of tears
I want to hold you, call my name immediately
I will accept sadness and bluffing in my hands
I suddenly turned my back on you and ran away
Because you have been so gentle to many other girls
Because it will not be over after this
I cannot say I am sorry, sorry
Even though I believe you, my lips are pouting
Catch me in the town where a drizzle is falling
Because I will turn around and give you a make-up kiss
They have been doing nothing but playing knight from dawn to dusk and calling it training.
They look like they are enjoying themselves, so what is wrong with it?
But it looks like someone wants to object.
I can understand your feelings with Saito busy with the Order every day.
I-I do not have any problem with that!
Sure, I admit that we have not had much time to talk despite his coming back from the war.
More importantly, you decided to come to the academy?
Since you told me to muster the courage.
Although it is a secret that I am a half-elf.
I promised that I would protect you, did not I?
What is the big smile on his face all about?
Where do you think you are going without saying a word to your master?!
Where else other than the Order's training?
Same as yesterday and the day before.
Master, I am off to training.
What are you so mad about so early in the morning?
I want to spend more time together like before.
Why do not you get it, you dense dog?
Is there something you need me for?
I will come back early today.
What is your afternoon schedule looking like?
No, please schedule some time with me.
Tiffa became popular in no time.
The hottest topic on campus right now is whether her great breasts are real or not.
How am I supposed to know?
If it is come down to this, I shall find out with my own hands!
Montmo will kill you, you know?
Were you listening to anything I said?
I was saying we should recruit more people into the Order of Undine Knights.
Sure, but how do we do that?
I heard there is another chevalier on this campus other than Saito.
This hat will suit your beauty the most!
No, this hat will look the best on you.
It is got to be this!
Crap, if they take her hat off, they will find out she is a half-elf.
Oh my, it is so cute.
If he sees me like this, I bet he will...
It is a master's duty to give presents once in a while.
Forgive me for leaving you unattended!
But just one apology is not enough!
I am sorry for getting caught up with playing knight.
I am sorry for staring at Tiffania's breasts.
T-Then, demonstrate your thoughts with action!
Louise, I always wanted to hold you tight like this!
I will not ever leave you alone anymore.
So would you join the Order of Undine Knights?
I am not interested in playing knight.
Who do you think she is?
Princess Beatrice of the Grand Duchy of Guldenhorf.
You get to be in the same class with the Princess,
yet you do not even come to introduce yourself to her.
Take that dirty hat off first.
There has to be a limit to how rude you are.
When I tell you to take it off, you take it off!
What are you guys doing to Tiffania?!
What is this all of a sudden?
Do not you know who she is?
No matter who she is, she should not bully others.
Oh, if it is not Princess Guldenhorf.
A barbarian that was just appointed a chevalier.
If you talk with a man like this in the hallway,
A mature lady should not show any weakness at any time.
I said it is fine, so it is fine!
I will let you go today.
But the next time you are to take that dirty hat off in front of me.
Are not you supposed to be from a really honourable family?
Why are you deferring so much to an underclassman?
She is a bad person to be on the bad side of.
Although it is just a small independent nation, she is a princess of a country.
She is really rich and has her personal guards here with her.
They are called the Luft Panzer Ritter.
They are known as the strongest dragon knights in Halcheginia.
I would not want to get in trouble with them.
They have deployed an entire Knight detachment for their daughter at school?
The wealthy like to put on a display.
I just want to look cool!
I do not care about their dragon knights.
If they ever come to you for anything, let me know.
Sorry, I already ate with Guiche.
I had to discuss something with him.
Oh, and I wanted to ask you about this too, Louise.
It looks like Tiffania's being bullied.
Is there anything we can do?
You are related to a duke, right?
Maybe you should just leave her alone.
A word of warning will not -
I am saying it is her own business!
She chose to come here of her own will, so she should take care of herself!
Is this what was on your mind all these days?
The Order's got nothing to do with this!
I am going to bed now, so do not talk to me.
You are the one who said to come back early.
I have been waiting for hours, and he gets carried away when I am being nice to him...
All he cares about is that half-elf.
I do not care about you anymore.
Miss Valliere, you will be late for your classes.
I could not get a wink of sleep, so I am not feeling well.
I cannot because any more trouble for Saito-san and the others.
I have to take care of myself.
This robe is a memento of my mother!
Are you by any chance an e-e -
She is an elf, and she became more popular than me?
I want to be friends with you all!
There is no way an elf will not do anything bad!
Elves have certainly been the enemies of humans in Halcheginia for many years.
But my parents fell in love with each other and gave me both elf and human blood.
Oh, so you are a half-elf?
You wish to be friends with us,
so you believe in the same god as we do, right?
Guldenhorf Grand Duchy, Luft Panzer Ritter.
Is not it a little noisy?
Stupid Saito... Stupid Saito... Stupid Saito...
I happen to be a bishop.
Prove your faith to me, a deputy of God.
What do you want me to do?
It is just the right temperature for anyone who believes in the Primogenitor, Brimir.
Why is not anyone stopping this?
Are you afraid of the dragon knights?
If you side with her, they will treat you as a heretic and send you to prison.
In that case, go back to where you came from.
Then I will treat it as though none of this happened.
I have always wanted to see the outside world.
Saito-san and everyone else made that dream come true.
So I will not go back!
If I tell you to go home, then you will go home!
No, I guess that is wrong.
I do not care what happens to me.
This is not only about you.
This will cause an inquiry to befall your beloved, as well.
I am the one who brought Tiffa here.
I guess I do not have a choice!
Looks like you are a heretic, too.
What is this about, Mr. Gramont?
It is a shame on knighthood to forsake ladies and one's friends.
Knights are to decide things with wands.
I cannot help acting cool when there is such an audience!
Why did you wake me up?!
I was having such a good dream...
You had better beware of the consequences!
Do you even have the right?
I-If you mean the bishop's license, I have it at home.
To perform an inquiry, you need the Romalia Sectarian Head's written permission.
She did not have the right?
She uttered God's name in vain?
I-I have got nothing to do with this.
I did not know elves were so kind.
I think I want to be her friend, too.
I totally fell in a state of panic.
I think I can make lots of good friends here.
Now, I would like to say everything's solved,
but there is one thing I must definitely ask!
Your familiar is interesting as always.
You are here to be cynical?
It is difficult to get down on one's knees in that situation.
your beloved will be questioned as well.
He bowed his head after hearing that.
I wonder who he thought about.
Everyone is talking about them, and even the Principal asked a moment ago.
There has to be a reason why everyone is wondering, but I cannot tell what that might be.
You are the only person I can ask!
Do you have any idea why they do not look real?
I think I need to inspect them a little more.
I am the one to see him first!
He is my familiar, so I should be first!
Hey, do you have a whip on you?
Luckily, I happen to have one right here.
There is a reason for this!
And you want to shame yourself even more?!
If there is a hole, you want to hide in it, you say?
I will not forgive you if you look away.
